extendedInfo.description: NES-FC is the high quality and fast NES&FC emulator. Play almost all your NES/FC games.Please try NES-FC Lite before purchasing!Features:+ Hardware keyboard support+ On-screen virtual gamepad with optional viberation feedback+ Support trackball+ Ten manual slots for save states with previews+ Game Genie support!+ FDS support!+ Multi-touch for 2.1++ Zapper/Light gun support, touch screen to fire, need to disable virtual gamepad!+ Fast Forward+ Screenshots+ Wiimote support+ Nes, fds, zip files support+ Turbo buttons***Button Design: Fede Stock (federico.stock@gmail.com) No titles are included in this app. ***Copy or download games to your SD Card and browse them within the app (default directory is /mnt/sdcard) and select to play.***To use fds, need to download BIOS file(The name is often ***.bin, e.g. [BIOS] Nintendo Famicom Disk System Japan).bin ) from Internet and transfer it to your SD card. Then select the file in the app. And then open fds rom to play. And use Eject/Insert option to change disk side.Note:When you need to change the disk side, please eject the used one and insert another.***To use Game Genie, need to download BIOS file(The name is often ***.nes, e.g. Game Genie (Unl).nes ) from Internet and transfer it to your SD card. Then select the file in the app and enable game genie. And then open rom file to play, you will see the game genie input screen. Note: you need to get the game genie code before input.***To use Keyboard: if you have a tablet with a keyboard (like the ASUS Transformer), going into the system settings and changing the input from 'ASUS Keyboard' to 'ANDROID Keyboard' pretty much fixes all problems with assigning keys. ***Weird problems: if you used the lite version and then bought full version, maybe you would encounter some weird problems, so please uninstall the lite version and full version, then reinstall the full version. Please report any crashes/problems via email (include your device name and android version). I cannot answer the comments and will update the app ASAP.Hi guys,If you encounter a problem like "when I run and press A or B it wont let me use either button until I stop running". And if you make sure your phone can support multi-touch,please send me an email about your device name, type, android version and the game name.Thanks!

reviews.title: 5 star all the way
reviews.comment: The best nes emu on market :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great emulator!
reviews.comment: I would five star if it had native MOGA support.
reviews.author: Jason Hurt

reviews.title: Well done. A couple weak spots.
reviews.comment: Performance wise, zero problems. A far as ROMS go, this app has loaded, saved and played them all perfectly.     However, it is definitely a battery killer, and if they worked with other developers on solving this horrid Bluetooth and 4.2.2 problem so I could use my Wii controller, that\'d be amazing.
reviews.author: Dave Lapsley

reviews.title: Dig it
reviews.comment: I liked your nes em. Seems to be the only one that worked for me so, I bought it. Got any other ems?
reviews.author: Julio Valladares

reviews.title: Control issues
reviews.comment: Frequently experience issues with buttons not functioning including both menus and controls.
reviews.author: Ben Nesbitt

reviews.title: No multi touch
reviews.comment: Sometimes buttons are not responsive when more than one are pressed at the same time which makes the app kinda useless for harder levels.
reviews.author: juan soldi

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Save!
reviews.comment: Works great, just can\'t save.  Which pretty much sucks.  Still better than the others.
reviews.author: Stacey Grieco

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: Excellent no lag what so ever
reviews.author: Liam Cole

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: This is just an awesome emu for android! It plays all games perfect with no lag at all which is outstanding. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great! Needs more
reviews.comment: I\'d 5 star this in a heartbeat if it had custom interface layouts for the buttons like Super GNES does.
reviews.author: Darrell Walls

reviews.title: Great Emulator, but...
reviews.comment: Upgraded to full version so I can have save states. However, when I load the save states they are non -responsive. This had happened on quite a few games. Add that to the fact that it does not support in game saves, and this app becomes very frustrating. Not recommended for rpg\'s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like going back in time!
reviews.comment: I have a Pantech Breakout. I love this. I downloaded Zelda, Link, SMB1 & SMB2 so far. Not one problem or hitch to speak of. Couldn\'t figure out how to save games so I bought the pay version, but once I figured it out  I realized it wasn\'t necessary. Free version has 10 save slots already in menu. It\'s ok though. Still worth it to support the developer. Great game play. Just as I remember. Great job! Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent support
reviews.comment: Had an issue with state save not working. Developer worked with me till it was resolved.   Files transferred with Bluetooth would not function properly.  when I used USB transfer cable, everything was resolved.
reviews.author: Michael Charles

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Choppy/laggy on android ICS
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: It\'s a good Lil emulator. My only complaint is why no link for the game genie.bin?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nes fc
reviews.comment: Love it. Works great on my experia play.
reviews.author: Brian Jackson

reviews.title: Please fix
reviews.comment: Needs update for multi touch. When playing games using d pad and pressing button its un responsive
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: Works great, smooth game play, works with Wii Remote. I don\'t regret buying this at all.
reviews.author: Matthew Konieczny

reviews.title: Games work fine
reviews.comment: But desperatly needs to fix the freezes that often accour when loading a saved state...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Kickin\' It Oldschool
reviews.comment: Works near flawless. Sometimes when loading a save state, I\'ll get a constant tone, but it goes away when the music changes. Also sometimes I get errors when playing FDS games. Still have not been able to play a full FC game yet.
reviews.author: A Google User
